Alteration 7

Prison of Sedna

Add To Effect Value (10):Encase in Ice
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], May Use Underwater [uwok], Use Underwater Only [uwonly])
The caster transforms the water surrounding the enemies into ice. The encased targets are protected from strikes, but must break free to be able to move or defend themselves. While encased they will become chilled and numbed and suffer fatigue.
Targets are encased in ice for 10 points. Each point grants +1 prot. Str roll vs 12 reduces the number of encase points. Target gets 5 cold fatigue dmg each turn while encased.
